tool_description: An API that works with yande.re website  The available tags are at About page, This API Its not complete.
name: YandereImageAPI
title: YandereImageAPI

api_list.name: Search By Tags
api_list.description: This Endpoint will get a image by his tad
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yandereimageapi.p.rapidapi.com/search/Read About Page"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yandereimageapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
